revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NAG |model=SNR-CPE |revision=-ME1 |asin= |series=AC750 |image1=SNR-CPE-ME1.png |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |availability=now |est_release_date=05/2017 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id= |type=wireless router, CPE, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model=DDR3 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2576L;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;3.4.113;Wive-NG-MT; |tp_firmware=Wive-NG |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Wive-NG-MT |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=Admin |oui=F8:F0:82 |oui_eth=F8:F0:82 }} {{TagLine|AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[https://shop.nag.ru/catalog/00009.Besprovodnoe-oborudovanie/05935.Wifi-routery-SNR/23099.SNR-CPE-ME1 Product page]
Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/about-wive-ng-mt/ ''Wive-NG-MT'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU)
The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. :Default SSIDs Wive-NG-MT.
===Specifications=== :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/podrobnee-o-snr-cpe-me1/ ''SNR-CPE-ME1'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU) *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core) *Flash: ''GigaDevice'' [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:64805:7096#7096 GD25Q128CSIG] 16MB (SPI) *RAM: 256MB (DDR3) *WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603EN/MT7610EN :PA: [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:63557:5179#5179 SE2576L] / SE5003L (?) :20dBm (100mW)/2.4GHz, 23dBm (200mW)/5GHz *WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 4x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (power off/on) :supports Entware (Flash/HDD), :3G/4G modem (RAS/NDIS)
===See also=== :[[List of Wive-ng firmware supported devices]] *[[NAG SNR-CPE-ME1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-MD1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W2N]] - N300 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W4N (rev.M)]] - N300 Wireless Router :CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620N]] (2T2R 802.11bgn), ESMT :BL-RM7620N-V1.2 • [https://cs5-1.4pda.to/12284725/20180226_114015.jpg PCB image] <!-- • [https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=882086 4pda forum] -->
